title: Recipe App
description: A meal recipe explorer built using React and TheMealDB API. Users can search meals, browse by category, and view full recipe details including ingredients and instructions.
technologies: React, Tailwind CSS, TheMealDB API, React Router

title: Shopping App
description: A shopping web app built using React, Tailwind CSS, DummyJSON API, and features like cart, favorites, and product details.

title: Parfum App
description: A shopping web app built using React, Tailwind CSS, React Router Dom, Free Fake API, and features like cart, and product details.
technologies: React, Tailwind CSS, Free Fake API
